sql.search: SELECT main.uid ,main.base_name ,main.base_address ,main.principal ,main.founding_time ,main.number_of_people ,main.contact_number ,main.remark ,main.insert_user ,main.update_user ,main.insert_date ,main.update_date ,main.record_status ,insert_user.user_name insert_user_name ,update_user.user_name update_user_name FROM demo_base_info main LEFT JOIN sys_user insert_user ON insert_user.uid = main.insert_user LEFT JOIN sys_user update_user ON update_user.uid = main.update_user WHERE main.record_status = 1
